title: "Deloitte Survey: Scaling Artificial Intelligence (AI) Across the Life Sciences Value Chain"
excerpt: "More than 60% of life sciences companies say they spent over $20 million on AI initiatives last year, and more than half expect investments to increase this year. Enhancing existing products and creating new products and services are the top two outcomes life sciences organizations hope to achieve as a result of further investment in AI."
